metadata.Title: CVE-2022-1210 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - medium.
metadata.Description: A vulnerability classified as problematic was found in LibTIFF 4.3.0. Affected by this vulnerability is the TIFF File Handler of tiff2ps. Opening a malicious file leads to a denial of service. The attack can be launched remotely but requires user interaction. The exploit has been disclosed to the public and may be used.

notes.Note: ccdm94> No patch available for this issue as of 2022-07-13. In the issue page for this vulnerability (issue 402), there is a discussion about this actually being a libjbig bug instead of a tiff bug.

criterions.comment: tiff package in impish is affected, but a decision has been made to defer addressing it (note: '2022-07-13').
